p: Crystals of the title compound were obtained by slow diffusion (three layers) in a 3 ml tube. The first layer contained 19 mg (0.05 mmol) of K 2[Pt(CN) 4] in 0.5 ml of water. The middle layer contained 1.5 ml of a water:acetone (1:1) solution. The third layer contained 25 mg (0.05 mmol) of Fe(OTs) 2·6H 2O in 0.4 ml of acetone and 0.1 ml of water. The colourless crystals grew in the middle layer within three weeks and were kept in the mother solution prior to measurements.
